word:
"What shall it profit a man if he gain the whole world and lose his own soul, or what shall a man give in exchange for his soul? The time of God's dealing with His unfaithful, rebellious subjects has come. I will impress your minds, ye worldly rich men, with the thought of the heavenly 


                                     -352 

treasure you have lost by seeking to become rich in this world's goods, so that the gospel treasure lost its value in your eyes.
